segments.text: Ms.Green , are the schools more or less similar everywhere throughout the United States , or do they differ in various sections ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The system of public schools is fairly uniform everywhere throughout the United States .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do most students in the United States attend private schools or public schools ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Most public schools in the United States are very good , and the majority of students attend the public schools .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which students go to private schools , then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Children needing special instruction . Children whose parents can afford to send them to private schools , and children whose parents want them to receive a religious education .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But are the public schools good everywhere ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , public schools can be very different . Even in the same city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dose it cost anything to attend the public schools ? Are there any restrictions as to who may and may not attend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The public schools in the United States are free to everyone and there is no cost to the student . In most states , even the textbooks are free . There are no restrictions as to color , race , or religion.Any student wishing to attend the public schools may do so .
segments.speaker: S2
